articles.description: A true knot of the umbilical cord (TKUC) is an actual knot formed in pregnancy. It is seen in approximately 0.3%-1.2% of all pregnancies. True knots are of significance as they can cause a wide spectrum of adverse perinatal outcomes like small for gestational…
